# Birthday Greeting Website Project

## Project Overview
Modern Next.js website for birthday greeting with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14+ with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- React

## Design Requirements
- Pink theme (soft pink colors predominant)
- Beautiful animations
- Responsive design
- Global accessibility

## Project Details
- Birthday person: Elizaveta
- Date: November 7
- Age: 20 years old
